about_the_game:
Voice Drama

◆Warning◆
This voice drama is only available in Japanese.

This data is a compilation of voice dramas that are a bonus when you purchase "Sex-Loving Family".
The voice drama contains the following contents.

Normal version mp3 data
01_Sister_Slaves_Formula_specials.mp3
02_Sister_Slaves_Steam_specials.mp3
03_Sister_Slaves_Steam_specials2.mp3


wav files for high quality sound
01_Sister_Slaves_Formula_specials.wav
02_Sister_Slaves_Steam_specials.wav
03_Sister_Slaves_Steam_specials2.wav

Please use the high quality sound data to convert to formats other than mp3.

◆Video data with subtitles
Subtitled video data for voice drama.
※Not all voice dramas.
※Subtitles are machine translated text.

・Voice Drama with English Subtitles.mp4
・語音劇繫化字幕.mp4
・语音剧简化字幕.mp4

・Voice Drama2_english.mp4
・Voice Drama2_schinese.mp4
・Voice Drama2_tchinese.mp4


・Location of Video




Content Warning

This Hois Drama contains content not suitable for all ages and may not be
and may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace.
General adult content.
